## 
1.生成预览：
```
sudo nextcloud.occ preview:generate-all
```

2.设置php内存：
```
sudo snap set nextcloud php.memory-limit=3072M
```

3. Crontab : 
```
//the Crontab must run with Root user
15 * * * * sudo nextcloud.occ preview:generate-all
```


4. 信任域名

```
sudo nextcloud.occ config:system:set trusted_domains 2 --value=mynextcloud.com
```


5. 强制跳过安装（极端情况）
```
sudo nextcloud.manual-install {admin user} {password}
```
